mapper.sql: t1.app_id as appId, t1.item_id as itemId, t1.consultant_id as consultantId, t1.eval_result as evalResult, t1.order_number as orderNumber, t1.evaluator as evaluator, t1.eval_time as evalTime, t1.status as status, t1.state as state, t1.id as id
mapper.select:
select (SELECT NAME FROM z_application WHERE id = t1.app_id ) as appName, (SELECT NAME FROM z_comment_items WHERE id = t1.item_id ) as itemName, (SELECT NAME FROM z_consultant WHERE id = t1.consultant_id ) as consultantName,
from z_comment_record t1 join (SELECT id from z_comment_record where 1=1
and state = '1' order by id desc limit #{firstrownum}, #{limit}) t2 where t1.id = t2.id

select count(id) from z_comment_record where 1=1
and state = '1'

select (SELECT NAME FROM z_application WHERE id = t1.app_id ) as appName, (SELECT NAME FROM z_comment_items WHERE id = t1.item_id ) as itemName, (SELECT NAME FROM z_consultant WHERE id = t1.consultant_id ) as consultantName,
from z_comment_record t1 join (SELECT id from z_comment_record where 1=1
and eval_time BETWEEN #{evalTimeStart} and #{evalTimeEnd}
and state = '1' order by id desc limit #{firstrownum}, #{limit}) t2 where t1.id = t2.id
